title: Sign uncertainty and de Branges spaces
authors: Emanuel Carneiro, Tolibjon Ismoilov, and Antonio Pedro Ramos
abstract:
We investigate here the sign uncertainty phenomenon for bandlimited
functions, with a competing condition given by integration with respect to a
general measure. Our main result provides a framework related to the theory of
de Branges spaces of entire functions, that allows one to find the sharp
constants and classify the extremizers in a broad range of situations. We
discuss an application in number theory, in connection to bounds for zeros of
$L$-functions.
